resources.string: My opportunity is my new currency

This application helps individuals find training or employment opportunities with various companies. Its user-friendly interface and resources for job seekers make it easy to find job and training that align with career goals.

Self-confidence is key to exploiting opportunities. It allows individuals to believe in their abilities, take risks and pursue new ventures with conviction, ultimately leading to greater personal and professional growth.
Achieving one\'s dreams requires seizing opportunities. By being open to new experiences and taking risks, individuals can turn their dreams into reality and fulfill their aspirations.
"Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don't recognize them." - Ann Landers.

Opportunity app is an application developed by Aymen Knour, an intern at ISTA Hay Riad. This application is divided into two distinct sections. The first section allows trainees to send their CV to the administration in order to find internship or job opportunities. The second section is dedicated to the administration and allows them to view all the information entered by the trainees, including their CV.


We would like to express our sincere thanks to the security staff, the administration, the trainers for their valuable help and support throughout the development of this application.
